title: AMP2023 @ JHU
text:
The 2023 Annual Meeting on Phonology (AMP) is scheduled to be held in person on October 20-22, hosted by Johns Hopkins at either 555 Pennsylvania Avenue, Washington, D.C. or the Homewood campus in Baltimore, MD. AMP, founded in 2013, is held every Fall, and showcases high quality research in all areas of phonology.

Submission link: https://easychair.org/conferences/?conf=amp2023

Any questions about submissions or conference organization can be emailed to  amp2023jhu@gmail.com

More details coming soon!
